titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at S. Maries in Oxford vpon the feast of Epiphany concerning the true comfort of God his Church truly millitant and apologie of the same. Ianuary 6. 1589. By Edwarde Hutchins Maister of Arts, and fellow of Brazen-nose College in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Hutchins, Edward, 1558?-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold in Pauls Church yeard, at the signe of the Tygres head,

notesStmt.note: Sold by T. Cooke, London. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
